title: Smart Profitability Dashboard
subtitle: Visualize revenue, expenses and profit with CSV import and PDF export.
paragraphs: Smart Profitability Dashboard helps you monitor monthly revenue, costs and profit, import CSVs, and generate PDF reports for stakeholders.
Upload or paste CSV data with headers month,revenue,cost,extra to replace the chart data.

faqs.a: Headers required: month,revenue,cost,extra. See the example text area for format.

faqs.q: Can I export a PDF report?
faqs.a: Yes â€” the tool uses html2canvas and jsPDF to create a downloadable PDF snapshot of the report.
